description: Scrape content from any URL with advanced options including format selection, content filtering, mobile emulation, and more

inputs.name: formats
inputs.description: Output formats to include (markdown, html, rawHtml, links, screenshot, summary, json). Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: only_main_content
inputs.description: Only return the main content excluding headers, navs, footers, etc.

inputs.name: include_tags
inputs.description: HTML tags to include in the output. Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: exclude_tags
inputs.description: HTML tags to exclude from the output. Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: max_age
inputs.description: Returns cached version if younger than this age in milliseconds (default: 2 days)

inputs.name: wait_for
inputs.description: Delay in milliseconds before fetching content to allow page to load

inputs.name: mobile_device
inputs.description: Emulate scraping from a mobile device

inputs.name: skip_tls_verification
inputs.description: Skip TLS certificate verification when making requests

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.description: Timeout in milliseconds for the request

inputs.name: remove_base64_images
inputs.description: Remove base64 images from output (keeps alt text)

inputs.name: block_ads
inputs.description: Enable ad-blocking and cookie popup blocking

inputs.name: store_in_cache
inputs.description: Store the page in Firecrawl index and cache

inputs.name: zero_data_retention
inputs.description: Enable zero data retention for this scrape

outputs.name: success
outputs.description: Whether the scraping operation was successful

outputs.name: markdown
outputs.description: Markdown version of the scraped content

outputs.name: raw_html
outputs.description: Raw HTML content of the page

outputs.name: links
outputs.description: List of links found on the page

outputs.name: summary
outputs.description: AI-generated summary of the page content

outputs.name: metadata
outputs.description: Extracted metadata including title, description, keywords, etc.

outputs.name: warning
outputs.description: Warning message if any issues occurred during scraping
